Italy on Monday [minute]

Information about indicator

Name of the indicator 2.1.2 Points of Interest - where do we spend time
Measure unit minute
Description of the indicator The data shows average number of minutes during a day spent in different places. The categories of places come from geographical location of the mobile phone holder.
Data sources BigO (mobile sensor data)
